mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHAT_REPORT (REPORTER, CHAT_ID, MESSAGE, WRITER) VALUES (#{reporter}, #{id}, #{message}, #{sender})
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ID, TU.EMAIL AS WRITER_EMAIL , WRITER, MESSAGE, STATUS, COUNT(*) AS REPORT_COUNT FROM TB_CHAT_REPORT JOIN TB_USER TU ON TB_CHAT_REPORT.WRITER = TU.USER_ID GROUP BY CHAT_ID, WRITER, MESSAGE, STATUS, TU.EMAIL

SELECT CHAT_ID, TU.EMAIL AS WRITER_EMAIL , WRITER, MESSAGE, STATUS, COUNT(*) AS REPORT_COUNT FROM TB_CHAT_REPORT JOIN TB_USER TU ON TB_CHAT_REPORT.WRITER = TU.USER_ID WHERE TB_CHAT_REPORT.WRITER = #{writer} GROUP BY CHAT_ID, WRITER, MESSAGE, STATUS, TU.EMAIL
